question: Shiv Lal, Hulas Lal, Jhoomak Lal, Fakir Chand, and Jai Ram Das were the famous artists of which of the following school of Art?
explanation: Some of the prominent artists of the Company School of Art were Shiv Lal, Hulas Lal, Jhoomak Lal, Fakir Chand, and Jai Ram Das lived in Patna. They had such a fame that some people call their paintings belonging to the Patna School.
